deal 7 (8) damage.
apply 3 (5) oceanrodent:encheesed.

(oceanrodent:hardy.)
gain 5 block.
increase this card's block by 1 whenever you play a card with this in hand.
exhaust.

add 1 (2) oceanrodent:junk to your hand.
whenever you draw a card this turn, the enemy loses 3 hp.

oceanrodent:encheesed does not wear off this turn.

whenever you finish a oceanrodent:wreckage, gain 5 (7) block.

discard your hand.

gain 7 (9) block.

(innate.)
whenever you discard a card during your turn, draw 1 card.

exhaust.

deal 11 (15) damage to all enemies.

cards.description: whenever you play a oceanrodent:grimy card, draw 1 card.

cards.description:
deal 15 (18) damage.
the next time you finish a oceanrodent:wreckage this turn, the enemy loses 15 (18) hp.

deal 16 (20) damage.
oceanrodent:grime this card.

deal 10 (13) damage.

unplayable.

cards.name: zip around

cards.name: beat chest

deal 6 (9) damage twice.

add 1 oceanrodent:junk to your hand.

exhaust.

cards.name: empty
cards.description:
shuffle 5 (7) oceanrodent:junk into your draw pile.
exhaust.

cards.name: exude
cards.description: apply double oceanrodent:encheesed the next 3 (4) times you apply it.

cards.name: hoard
cards.description: at the end of combat, choose 1 of 2 (3) oceanrodent:junk to add to your deck.

cards.name: lazors!!

double oceanrodent:grime on all cards.

(innate.)
oceanrodent:grime and discard your draw pile.
exhaust.

cards.name: rat king
cards.description: upgrade all future oceanrodent:junk.

cards.description:
discard your hand.
put 1 (2) card (cards) from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: recycling bin
cards.description:
discard your hand.
add 1 oceanrodent:junk to your hand for each card discarded.

cards.name: squeeze through
cards.description:
add 2 splinters into your hand.
gain 18 (24) block.

cards.name: stepping stones

cards.name: surprise shiv
cards.description:
retain.
deal 2 (3) damage.
increase this card's damage by 2 (3) whenever you exhaust a card with this in hand.
exhaust.

cards.description:
draw 2 (3) cards.
gain [E] equal to the number of oceanrodent:junk in your hand.
exhaust.

cards.name: tall form
cards.description:
~~- ethereal. -~~
whenever you play a card, apply 1 oceanrodent:encheesed to a random enemy.

relics.name: stolen fang
relics.description: upgrade the first 3 unupgraded cards you draw each combat.
relics.flavorText: a trophy from the greatest fight of your life.

relics.name: apple core
relics.description: start each combat with 1 oceanrodent:junk in your hand.
relics.flavorText: i swear this thing has at least like 2 more meals on it!

relics.name: cheese cake
relics.description: at the start of each combat, apply 3 oceanrodent:encheesed to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: should've looked for a recipe instead of trusting my gut...

relics.name: cracked lens
relics.description: at the start of each combat, discard 2 cards from your draw pile.

relics.name: bottle of dirt
relics.description: upon pickup, choose 3 cards. they start each combat oceanrodent:grimy.
relics.flavorText: if your cards aren't battle-ready then neither are you.

relics.name: net
relics.description: whenever you play 7 oceanrodent:junk, add 1 junk into your hand.
relics.flavorText: i'd rather be catching jellyfish than slaying this spire.

relics.name: pill
relics.flavorText: deciding to eat this was a bit of a gamble but i guess it paid off?

relics.name: sabre-toothed fangs
relics.description: replaces stolen fang. whenever you play an unupgraded card, upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: who knew fossils could be this useful?

relics.name: wire cutters
relics.description: at the end of combat, you may lose 10 hp to remove a card from your deck.
relics.flavorText: harder to use than it may seem.

relics.name: soggy sock
relics.description: whenever you apply oceanrodent:encheesed, apply 1 more.

potions.name: sugar
potions.description: nip: deal 2 damage to all enemies.

keywords.name: Encheesed
keywords.description: encheesed creatures take more attack damage this turn.

keywords.name: Grimy
keywords.description: grimy cards have extra damage and block the next time they're played.

keywords.name: Hardy
keywords.description: returns to your hand when discarded during your turn, triggering any listed effects.

keywords.name: Junk
keywords.description: junk cards cost 0, draw 1 card, and exhaust in addition to a random effect.

keywords.name: Nip
keywords.description: effect triggers every time you play a card this turn.

keywords.name: Tarnished
keywords.description: tarnishing cards prevents the next time they would consume grime.

keywords.name: Wreck
keywords.description: play x cards of the same type as this card this turn to trigger.
